# textList

**Instance Property**

The value that represents the text list.

## Declaration

```swift
var textList: NSTextList { get }
```

## Accessing the text elements

- **parent**: A text list element that refers to the enclosing text list element.
- **childElements**: An array that contains child text elements.

items.description: A text list element that refers to the enclosing text list element.
items.name: parent

items.description: An array that contains child text elements.
